description:
There is a newer release in this EA Sports franchise. Check out the latest release for all new gameplay features.

This is Madden like youâ€™ve never seen it.  Powered by the Frostbite engine, Madden NFL 18 introduces Longshot, a football redemption story you can play.  Your decisions lead forgotten prospect, Devin Wade on the pursuit to fulfil his NFL dream in the first ever Madden story mode.  Team up and dominate the gridiron with friends in MUT Squads and play each matchup to your liking with three all-new Play Styles: Arcade, Simulation, and Competitive.  Play the best real-world NFL matchups each week in Play Now Live!  New stadium exteriors surrounded by vast cityscapes bring the spectacle of NFL gameday to life in the most photorealistic game to date.  Madden NFL 18:  This is the Year!

*Conditions and restrictions apply. See https://www.easports.com/madden-nfl/game-disclaimers for details.
shortDescription: Madden NFL 18 takes a significant visual leap delivering the greatest looking Madden of all time with the power of the Frostbite engine.
title: Madden NFL 18
